original: Hugoson, Ebba Alvida, apotekare, Mjölby, f. 25/3/94 i Motala av disp. Hugo Andersson o. Alvida Widholm. — Stud:ex. i Stlilm 13, farm. kand. 18, apotiex. 23. Elev. v. apot. Örnen i Stlilm o. Duvan i Gbg 14-16, anst. v. Duvan i Gbg 18-20, apot. i Skurup, Mörsil, Alarstrand, Sollebrunn 24-26, Beckasinen i Karlstad 26-28, Kronan i Kristianstad 29-31, Enhörningen i Gbg 30-38, Änigel’n i Sithfa 38-4öi, p^niv. å apot. i Mjölby sed. 43. Medl. av styr. f. sydsv. kretsen av Sv. farm:-förb. 31, av Gbgskretsen 34-37, av fullm. 34-35 o. av centr:styr. 36-38.
translated: Hugoson, Ebba Alvida, pharmacist, from Mjölby. Born on March 25th, 1894 in Motala to Hugo Andersson and Alvida Widholm. Completed high school in Stlilm in 1913, received a pharmacy degree in 1918, and a pharmacy license in 1923. Was a student at Örnen pharmacy in Stlilm and Duvan pharmacy in Gbg from 1914-1916. Worked at Duvan pharmacy in Gbg from 1918-1920, and at Skurup, Mörsil, Alarstrand, Sollebrunn, Beckasinen in Karlstad, Kronan in Kristianstad, Enhörningen in Gbg, and Änigel’n in Sithfa from 1924-1940. Has been working at a pharmacy in Mjölby since 1943. Member of the board for the southern district of the Swedish Pharmacists Association from 1931, the Gbg district from 1934-1937, a delegate from 1934-1935, and on the central board from 1936-1938. Married in 19xx, partner's name unknown.
